name: Starship Cinematics and Controller Demo
description:
This is a demonstration of proficiency with Unity 2021 set in a space theme.

Specific use-cases demonstrated:

  • Cinematic sequences with Cinemachine, Timeline, Virtual Cameras, and Post-Processing
  • Timeline controlled animations of non-player controlled ships as background activity
  • Player controller code written using legacy Unity input system for spaceship flight with mouse and keyboard input
  • Use of third party assets - models, shaders, effects
  • Setup, layout, and placement of game objects for a playable scene
  • Unity Physics system used for starship thrust
  • Basic UI implementation

Controls:

  • Mouse - Yaw and Pitch (Y-Axis is inverted)
  • W & S - Forward/Reverse thrust
  • A & D - Roll
  • Shift - Boost thruster
  • Tab - Change point-of-view
  • ESC - Exit application
